response.original_title: When the Gods Dance: Bharatanatyam, Kuchipudi: Parts 3 & 4
response.overview: Continuing the look inside India's glamorous dance world, Parts 3 and 4 of this Bollywood program feature segments with both stars and talented newcomers, along with movie clips from popular musicals. Part 3 showcases dancer Urmila Satyanarayana, dance pair Narasimhachari and Smt. Vasantalakshmi, and Priyalata Arun of the Singapore Indian Fine Arts Society. Part 4 features Chitra Vishveshwara, the Trio Sisters and Zari Hussian.
response.title: When the Gods Dance: Bharatanatyam, Kuchipudi: Parts 3 & 4
